VARIABLE.NAME: Theorem_Title
VARIABLE.VALUE: Absolute Konvergenz und Konvergenz eine Reihe

STEPDEF.VALUE: __math__(a_(n))_(n in NN) in CC^{NN}__math__ ist eine Folge in __math__CC__math__

Nach Cauchy-Kriterium f__ue__r konvergente Reihen __math__sum_(k__eq__0)^(oo) z_k__math__ gilt __math__AA_(epsilon__gt__0) EE_(n_epsilon in NN) AA_(n__gt__m__gt____eq__ n_epsilon) |sum_(k__eq__m+1)^(n) z_k| __lt__ epsilon__math__ .
Gegeben sei die absolut konvergente Reihe __math__sum_(n__eq__0)^(oo) a_n __math__

__math__AA_(epsilon __gt__ 0) EE_(n_epsilon in NN) AA_(n__gt__m__gt____eq__ n_epsilon) | sum_(k__eq__0)^(n) {:|a_k|:} - sum_(k__eq__0)^(m) {:|a_k|:} | __eq__ |sum_(k__eq__m)^(n) {:|a_k|:} | __lt__ epsilon __math__ .

__math__AA_(epsilon __gt__ 0) EE_(n_epsilon in NN) AA_(n__gt__m__gt____eq__ n_epsilon) | sum_(k__eq__m+1)^(n) {:|a_k|:} | __lt__ sum_(k__eq__m+1)^(n) |a_k| __lt__ epsilon __math__.
__math__AA_(epsilon __gt__ 0) EE_(n_epsilon in NN) AA_(n__gt__m__gt____eq__ n_epsilon) |sum_(k__eq__m+1)^(n) a_k|__math__ __math____lt____eq__ sum_(k__eq__m+1)^(n) |a_k| __lt__ epsilon __math__.
